meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7187.

td.p: Trevor Moore, a communications specialist from New York, New York
Alex Maggio, a writer originally from Cincinnati, Ohio
Liz Fritz, an intake coordinator from Spring Hill, Kansas (whose 1-day cash winnings total $16,401)

tr.td: PRAISE THE LLOYD
(Alex Trebek: Not the Lord.)
2-LETTER ABBREVIATIONS
COUNTRIES' NATIONAL ANTHEMS
SCIENCE
HORROR FILMS
TRUCKING

toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex Trebek: Now, you noticed I stressed Constitution, not the Declaration of Independence.)

TrevorWhat is Jefferson City?
$2,600
LizWhat is Harrisburg
$6,200

$4,000
Madison')

Trevor

3rd place: $1,000

Alex
Trevor

(including 1 DD),
8 W
(including 2 DDs)

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
